DOC.HEAD: Pentagon Offers Numbers for Information
DOC.TEXT: The Pentagon has established telephone numbers for family members seeking information about civilians in Panama who work for the Defense Department, the department announced Friday. Previously, the callers could only obtain information about military personnel. Here are the numbers: Army _ Outside Virginia 1-800-233-5259; inside Virginia 1-800-468-7786 Navy _ Outside Virginia 1-800-523-2975; inside Virginia 1-800-572-2126 Air Force _ Outside Texas 1-800-531-5501; inside Texas 1-800-292-5642 Marine Corps _ 1-202-694-1492.
